name: Github Material Blue
description:
A flat new design for Github.

Want to write your own styles?

Try this new CSS preprocessor! You can download the latest release from github here.
additional_info:
Version 0.9
Improved readability of some buttons and set header color to blue
---------------------------------------------------
Version 0.8
Improved readability on buttons and other elements
---------------------------------------------------
Version 0.7
Will receive updates in the future.

discussions.name: Reaction icons are missing and some text is white on white
